title: Cant pick Chroma Pack?
body: I want to pick my chroma for vayne and it wont let me. It might be because of the new champ select. I had the chromas before he new champ select and used it before. Help!

replies.body:
Hey Toxikk Beast! 

This is a known issue with the new champ select. This issue should be resolved next patch!
It will be resolved in the next patch.* ;)
